mapper.insert: insert into appointment(patient_id, doctor_id, user_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status, information) values (#{patientId}, #{doctorId}, #{userId}, #{appointmentDate}, #{appointmentTime}, #{status}, #{information})
mapper.sql: SELECT a.appointment_id, a.patient_id, a.doctor_id, a.user_id, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_time, a.status, a.information, (SELECT CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(tb.start_time, '%H:%i'), ' - ', DATE_FORMAT(tb.end_time, '%H:%i') ) AS appointment_time_info FROM time_bucket tb WHERE tb.bucket_id = a.appointment_time) AS appointment_time_info FROM appointment a
mapper.update: update appointment set patient_id = #{patientId}, doctor_id = #{doctorId}, user_id = #{userId}, appointment_date = #{appointmentDate}, appointment_time = #{appointmentTime}, status = #{status}, information = #{information} where appointment_id = #{appointmentId}
